cards.notes: 2x RP on POS & e-commerce (~1%). 8 domestic lounge (2/qtr) + 2 intl/yr. Amazon Prime + 3-mo Swiggy One membership. 51 days interest-free. UPI-linkable. Star Rewardz program.

cards.name: Bank of India RuPay Platinum
cards.notes: 2 Star Points/₹100 (~0.5%). 3 Star Points/₹100 on preferred merchants. Welcome gift vouchers. Concierge 24/7. Insurance ₹2L. 51 days interest-free. UPI-linkable.

cards.name: BOI Mastercard Platinum Intl
cards.notes: 2 Star Points/₹100 (~0.5%). Accepted internationally. 3 lounge visits/yr. 51 days interest-free. EMI on purchases ₹5,000+.

cards.name: Central Bank World Credit Card
cards.notes: 3 RP/₹100 domestic, 4 RP/₹100 international (1 RP≈₹0.25 → 0.75% domestic, 1% intl). Loss protection ₹1L/day. Air accident insurance ₹10L. Fuel surcharge waiver ₹400-₹4,000.

cards.name: IOB RuPay Select
cards.notes: Super-premium RuPay variant. 2 domestic lounge/qtr + 2 intl/yr. 1% fuel surcharge waiver (₹400-₹5,000, cap ₹250/cycle). Accident insurance ₹10L (NPCI). Fee may be waived on spend threshold.

cards.name: IOB Visa Classic
cards.notes: RP on POS & e-commerce (~0.5%). Credit limit up to ₹5L. Up to 4 add-on cards. Fuel surcharge waiver. Basic entry-level card.

cards.name: Bajaj Finserv RBL World Prime SuperCard
cards.notes: 2 RP/₹100 (~1%). 12,000 welcome RP on ₹2K spend in 30 days. 10K bonus at ₹1.5L annual, 20K at ₹3.5L. BOGO movie (2x/mo BMS). 8 domestic lounge/yr. EMI card + cash card + loan card in one.

cards.name: Bajaj Finserv RBL Platinum Prime SuperCard
cards.notes: 2 RP/₹100 (~0.5%). 5x RP on Bajaj Finserv partner electronics. 4,000 welcome RP. 10K bonus at ₹1.5L annual spend. Fuel surcharge waiver ₹100/mo. EMI + cash + loan card in one.

cards.name: Kotak Zen Signature
cards.notes: 5 Zen Points/₹150 base (0.83%). 10 Zen Points/₹150 on shopping/lifestyle/jewellery (1.67%). Cap 6,500 pts/cycle. No pts on fuel/wallet/rent/gaming. 1 Zen Pt=₹0.20-0.25. Fee waived on ₹1.5L spend. Milestone: 7,500 pts at ₹3L or 15,000 pts at ₹6L/yr.

cards.name: Kotak Royale Signature
cards.notes: 4 RP/₹150 on hotels/airlines/dining/travel (0.66%). 2 RP/₹150 others (0.33%). 1 RP=₹0.20-0.25. No pts on fuel/wallet/rent/gaming. Annual fee waived on ₹1L spend. Milestone: 10K pts at ₹4L or 30K at ₹8L/yr.

routeTemplates.name: Amazon Gift Card → Pay on Amazon

steps.label: Buy Amazon Gift Card on Amazon.in
Use GC balance to pay bill/recharge on Amazon

routeTemplates.tip: Amazon GC purchase codes as online shopping. Your card's online rate applies instead of utility rate. GC valid for 1 year.
routeTemplates.notes: Check Amazon Pay > Offers for additional cashback. Some billers may charge ₹5-15 convenience fee.

routeTemplates.name: Amazon Gift Card → Amazon Shopping

steps.label: Buy Amazon Gift Card with best online-rate card
Shop on Amazon using GC balance

routeTemplates.tip: Useful if you have a card with higher online rate than Amazon Pay ICICI (5%). Also helps when your primary card is at monthly cap.
routeTemplates.notes: Compare with direct payment via Amazon Pay ICICI (5% for Prime members).

routeTemplates.name: Swiggy GC via Amazon → Swiggy

steps.label: Buy Swiggy Gift Card on Amazon.in
Use Swiggy GC for food delivery / Instamart

routeTemplates.tip: Uses your online rate instead of dining/grocery rate. Compare with HDFC Swiggy card (10% direct on Swiggy).
routeTemplates.notes: Swiggy GCs available on Amazon. Check expiry before buying large amounts.

routeTemplates.name: Zomato GC via Amazon → Zomato

steps.label: Buy Zomato Gift Card on Amazon.in
Use Zomato GC for food delivery

routeTemplates.tip: Uses online rate instead of dining rate. Good when your online card rate > dining rate.
routeTemplates.notes: Zomato GCs sold on Amazon.

routeTemplates.name: BookMyShow GC via Amazon → Movies

steps.label: Buy BookMyShow Gift Card on Amazon.in
Book movie tickets with BMS GC

routeTemplates.tip: Some cards offer BOGO on BookMyShow directly (ICICI Coral, SBI ELITE 2 free/mo). Compare total value including BOGO.
routeTemplates.notes: Uses online rate instead of entertainment rate.

routeTemplates.name: BigBasket GC via Amazon → Groceries

steps.label: Buy BigBasket Gift Card on Amazon.in
Use GC for grocery shopping on BigBasket

routeTemplates.tip: HDFC Tata Neu cards give 5% on BigBasket via Tata Neu app. Compare both routes.
routeTemplates.notes: Uses online rate instead of grocery rate.

routeTemplates.name: Amazon GC → OTT via Amazon Pay

steps.label: Buy Amazon Gift Card on Amazon.in
Pay OTT subscription via Amazon Pay balance

routeTemplates.tip: Netflix, Hotstar, Prime Video etc. can be paid via Amazon Pay.
routeTemplates.notes: Uses online rate instead of entertainment rate. Check if your OTT accepts Amazon Pay.

routeTemplates.name: Flipkart Gift Card → Flipkart Shopping

steps.label: Buy Flipkart Gift Card on Flipkart.com
Shop on Flipkart using GC balance

routeTemplates.tip: Compare with Flipkart SBI (5%) or Axis Flipkart (5%) direct rates.
routeTemplates.notes: GC purchase codes as online shopping.

routeTemplates.name: Myntra GC via Flipkart → Myntra

steps.label: Buy Myntra Gift Card on Flipkart.com
Shop on Myntra using GC

routeTemplates.tip: HDFC Regalia Gold gives 5x on Myntra directly. Axis Flipkart gives 7.5% on Myntra.
routeTemplates.notes: Uses online rate. Myntra GCs available on Flipkart.

routeTemplates.name: Flipkart GC → Cleartrip Flight

steps.label: Buy Flipkart Gift Card on Flipkart.com
Book flight on Cleartrip using Flipkart GC

routeTemplates.tip: Cleartrip is Flipkart-owned and accepts Flipkart GC/SuperCoins.
routeTemplates.notes: Uses online rate instead of travel rate for the GC purchase step.

routeTemplates.name: Flipkart GC → Recharge on Flipkart

steps.label: Buy Flipkart Gift Card on Flipkart.com
Recharge on Flipkart using GC balance

routeTemplates.tip: Flipkart offers mobile and DTH recharges.
routeTemplates.notes: Uses online rate instead of utility rate.

routeTemplates.name: HDFC SmartBuy → Amazon Voucher

steps.label: Buy Amazon voucher via HDFC SmartBuy portal
Use Amazon voucher for purchase

routeTemplates.tip: Infinia/Diners Black earn ~33% via SmartBuy (10x points). Regalia ~13%. Best stacking route in India.
routeTemplates.notes: Only for HDFC credit card holders. SmartBuy Amazon voucher cap: ₹10,000/txn (buy multiple). Check SmartBuy availability.

routeTemplates.name: HDFC SmartBuy → Flipkart Voucher

steps.label: Buy Flipkart voucher via HDFC SmartBuy
Use Flipkart voucher for shopping

routeTemplates.tip: Same 10x multiplier as Amazon voucher route. Infinia/Diners Black ~33%.
routeTemplates.notes: Only for HDFC card holders.

routeTemplates.name: HDFC SmartBuy → Flight Booking

steps.label: Book flight via HDFC SmartBuy portal

routeTemplates.tip: Infinia/Diners Black: ~33% effective via 10x points. Even Regalia gets ~13%.
routeTemplates.notes: Only for HDFC card holders. SmartBuy partners: EaseMyTrip, Cleartrip etc.

routeTemplates.name: HDFC SmartBuy → Hotel Booking

steps.label: Book hotel via HDFC SmartBuy portal

routeTemplates.tip: 10x reward points on SmartBuy hotel bookings with premium HDFC cards.
routeTemplates.notes: Only for HDFC card holders.

routeTemplates.name: HDFC SmartBuy → Train Booking

steps.label: Book train via HDFC SmartBuy IRCTC

routeTemplates.tip: SmartBuy has IRCTC integration. 10x points for Infinia/Diners Black.
routeTemplates.notes: Only for HDFC card holders.

routeTemplates.name: Tata Neu App → BigBasket

steps.label: Order BigBasket via Tata Neu app
Earn NeuCoins from Tata Neu platform (+1%)

routeTemplates.tip: HDFC Tata Neu Infinity card gives 5% NeuCoins on all Tata ecosystem purchases via this app.
routeTemplates.notes: ~1% additional NeuCoins from Tata Neu platform. Best with HDFC Tata Neu cards.

routeTemplates.name: Tata Neu App → Croma

steps.label: Order on Croma via Tata Neu app
Earn NeuCoins from Tata Neu platform (+1%)

routeTemplates.tip: HDFC Tata Neu Infinity gives 5% on Croma via Tata Neu.
routeTemplates.notes: ~1% additional NeuCoins from platform.

routeTemplates.name: Pay via PhonePe (Credit Card on UPI)

steps.label: Pay bill/recharge on PhonePe using credit card

routeTemplates.tip: Axis ACE gives 5% on all utility bills paid via PhonePe/Google Pay. Check if your card supports CC on UPI.
routeTemplates.notes: RuPay cards can be linked to UPI directly. Visa/Mastercard CC on UPI support expanding.

routeTemplates.name: Pay via Google Pay (Credit Card)

steps.label: Pay bill/recharge on Google Pay using credit card

routeTemplates.tip: Axis ACE & Axis Google Pay cards give enhanced rewards on Google Pay. Google Pay occasionally offers scratch cards.
routeTemplates.notes: Check CC on UPI availability with your bank.

routeTemplates.name: Airtel Thanks App → Recharge

steps.label: Pay via Airtel Thanks app using credit card

routeTemplates.tip: Axis Airtel card gives 25% on Airtel recharges and 10% on utility bills via Airtel Thanks. Only for Airtel subscribers.
routeTemplates.notes: Best with Axis Airtel card. Other cards get standard utility rate.

routeTemplates.name: Cleartrip → Flight Booking

steps.label: Book flight on Cleartrip using credit card

routeTemplates.tip: Flipkart SBI card gives 5% on Cleartrip. Axis Flipkart also gives enhanced rates.
routeTemplates.notes: Cleartrip is Flipkart-owned.

routeTemplates.name: EaseMyTrip → Flight Booking

steps.label: Book flight on EaseMyTrip using credit card

routeTemplates.tip: SC EaseMyTrip card gives ~5% on EaseMyTrip bookings.
routeTemplates.notes: Good for Standard Chartered EaseMyTrip card holders.

routeTemplates.name: IRCTC Direct → Train Ticket

steps.label: Book on IRCTC using credit card

routeTemplates.tip: SBI IRCTC Premier gives 10% value back on AC classes. HDFC IRCTC RuPay gives 5%.
routeTemplates.notes: IRCTC charges ₹15-30 convenience fee per transaction.

routeTemplates.name: CRED RentPay → Rent

steps.label: Pay rent via CRED RentPay

routeTemplates.tip: Only worth it if your card's general rate > 2% platform fee. CRED also offers cashback/coins occasionally.
routeTemplates.notes: Platform charges ~2% fee. Net reward = card rate - 2%. Many cards exclude rent from rewards.

routeTemplates.name: NoBroker Pay → Rent

steps.label: Pay rent via NoBroker

routeTemplates.tip: Slightly lower fee than CRED. Ensure your card gives rewards on rent transactions.
routeTemplates.notes: Platform charges ~1.5% fee. Net reward = card rate - 1.5%.

routeTemplates.name: Nykaa GC via Amazon → Nykaa

steps.label: Buy Nykaa Gift Card on Amazon.in
Shop on Nykaa using GC

routeTemplates.tip: Amex SmartEarn gives 10x on Nykaa directly (~5%). Compare with GC route.
routeTemplates.notes: Nykaa GCs available on Amazon.

routeTemplates.name: Scapia App → Travel Booking

steps.label: Book via Scapia app using Scapia Federal card

routeTemplates.tip: Scapia Federal gives 4% on travel via Scapia app (vs 2% elsewhere). Zero forex markup.
routeTemplates.notes: Only for Scapia Federal Bank card holders.

routeTemplates.name: RuPay CC on UPI → Offline Store Payment

steps.label: Pay via UPI QR using RuPay credit card linked to PhonePe/GPay

routeTemplates.tip: RuPay credit cards work on UPI at any QR code merchant. Earn card rewards even at small shops that don't accept card swipes.
routeTemplates.notes: Link RuPay CC to PhonePe, Google Pay, CRED, or Paytm. Card's general/category rate applies. NPCI occasionally runs RuPay UPI cashback schemes.

routeTemplates.name: RuPay CC on UPI → Grocery Store

steps.label: Pay at grocery store via UPI QR using RuPay CC

routeTemplates.tip: Works at kirana stores, supermarkets, any UPI QR. Your card's grocery rate applies even at shops that don't have a POS machine.
routeTemplates.notes: RuPay CC on UPI supported on PhonePe, Google Pay, CRED, Paytm.

routeTemplates.name: RuPay CC on UPI → Restaurant

steps.label: Pay at restaurant via UPI QR using RuPay CC

routeTemplates.tip: Earn dining rewards at restaurants that only accept UPI. Card's dining rate applies.
routeTemplates.notes: RuPay CC on UPI accepted at all UPI QR merchants.

routeTemplates.name: RuPay CC on UPI → Fuel Station

steps.label: Pay at fuel station via UPI using RuPay CC

routeTemplates.tip: Pay at any fuel station UPI QR. Avoids fuel surcharge that applies on card swipe. Card's fuel rate applies.
routeTemplates.notes: UPI payment avoids the 1% fuel surcharge (up to ₹500-1000 cap) charged on POS swipe. Net saving could be higher.

routeTemplates.name: RuPay CC on UPI → Recharge/Bills

steps.label: Pay bill/recharge via PhonePe/GPay using RuPay CC on UPI

routeTemplates.tip: RuPay CC on UPI works seamlessly for bill payments on PhonePe, Google Pay, Paytm. Same card rewards as POS/online.
routeTemplates.notes: NPCI sometimes runs additional cashback for RuPay CC on UPI transactions (₹50-150/month). Check npci.org.in for active offers.

routeTemplates.name: RuPay CC on UPI → Online Shopping

steps.label: Pay online using UPI with RuPay CC linked

routeTemplates.tip: Select UPI as payment method on Amazon/Flipkart/Swiggy/Zomato and pay with RuPay CC linked to your UPI app. Card's online rate applies.
routeTemplates.notes: Many online merchants offer UPI-specific discounts that stack with your card rewards. RuPay CC on UPI is widely accepted.

routeTemplates.name: CC on UPI → Bill Payment

steps.label: Pay bill on PhonePe/GPay using credit card via UPI

routeTemplates.tip: Credit card on UPI now supports Visa/Mastercard on select banks (Axis, HDFC, ICICI, Kotak etc.) in addition to RuPay. Check your bank's support.
routeTemplates.notes: CC on UPI expanding: RuPay (full support), Visa/MC (Axis, HDFC, ICICI, Kotak, SBI). Merchant must support UPI autopay or CC-on-UPI.

routeTemplates.name: CC on UPI → Offline Merchant

steps.label: Pay at UPI QR merchant using credit card on UPI

routeTemplates.tip: Earn card rewards at UPI-only merchants. Visa/MC CC on UPI rolling out on Axis, HDFC, ICICI, Kotak banks.
routeTemplates.notes: Check if your bank supports CC on UPI for your card network. RuPay has widest support.

routeTemplates.name: RuPay UPI + NPCI Cashback Scheme

steps.label: Pay via RuPay CC on UPI
NPCI RuPay UPI cashback (when active)

routeTemplates.tip: NPCI periodically runs RuPay credit card on UPI promotional cashback of ₹50-150/month. Check current offers on npci.org.in or your UPI app.
routeTemplates.notes: Estimated ~0.5% average platform bonus when NPCI scheme is active. Varies by period — verify current offer before relying on this.

routeTemplates.name: HP Pay App → HPCL Fuel

steps.label: Pay for fuel at HPCL via HP Pay app using credit card
HP Pay loyalty points + fuel surcharge waiver (~1%)

routeTemplates.tip: HP Pay avoids the 1% fuel surcharge charged on POS card swipe. Additional HP Pay loyalty rewards and seasonal cashback offers from the app.
routeTemplates.notes: Link your CC to HP Pay. Surcharge of ~1% (up to ₹500) is avoided on UPI/app payments vs POS swipe. HP Pay often has bank-specific fuel cashback promotions.

routeTemplates.name: IndianOil XTRA Rewards → IOCL Fuel

steps.label: Pay at IndianOil and earn XTRA Rewards with linked card
XTRA Rewards loyalty points (~0.75%)

routeTemplates.tip: Register your card on IndianOil XTRA Rewards app to earn additional loyalty points on every fuel purchase, stacked with card rewards.
routeTemplates.notes: IndianOil XTRA Rewards: 1 point per ₹100 fuel spend. Points redeemable for fuel. Free to join. Also gives birthday/anniversary bonus points.

routeTemplates.name: BPCL SmartDrive → BPCL Fuel

steps.label: Pay at BPCL station with SmartDrive linked card
BPCL SmartDrive loyalty points (~1%)

routeTemplates.tip: BPCL SmartDrive gives ~1% back as loyalty points on fuel. SBI BPCL card holders get 13x reward points at BPCL (~4.3% effective). Stack loyalty with card rewards.
routeTemplates.notes: Free to join BPCL SmartDrive. Points redeemable for fuel and merchandise. SBI BPCL card is the best pairing for BPCL fuel.

routeTemplates.name: EazyDiner → Restaurant Dining

steps.label: Book restaurant via EazyDiner app, pay with card
EazyDiner bill discount (~15% avg)

routeTemplates.tip: EazyDiner offers 10-40% off at 5,000+ partner restaurants. IndusInd EazyDiner card includes free EazyDiner Prime (up to 50% off). HDFC Diners Privilege/Black get enhanced EazyDiner offers.
routeTemplates.notes: Discount varies by restaurant (10-40%). EazyDiner Prime: ₹1,199/yr (free with IndusInd EazyDiner card). Card rewards earned on the discounted amount actually paid. Available in 20+ cities.

routeTemplates.name: Swiggy Dineout → Restaurant Dining

steps.label: Book restaurant via Swiggy Dineout, pay with card
Swiggy Dineout bill discount (~10% avg)

routeTemplates.tip: Swiggy Dineout offers 10-40% off at partner restaurants. HDFC Swiggy card holders get extra Dineout benefits. Swiggy One members get enhanced discounts.
routeTemplates.notes: Discount varies by restaurant (10-40%). Card rewards earned on amount actually paid. Available in 35+ cities. Pro tip: stack with bank offers visible on the Swiggy app.

routeTemplates.name: Dineout (Times Prime) → Restaurant

steps.label: Book restaurant via Dineout app, pay with card
Dineout bill discount (~10% avg)

routeTemplates.tip: Dineout (by Times Internet) offers 10-30% off at partner restaurants. Times Prime members get additional perks and higher discounts.
routeTemplates.notes: Dineout Passport gives flat 25% off at select premium restaurants. Card rewards earned on actual amount paid.

routeTemplates.name: magicpin → Restaurant Dining

steps.label: Pay at restaurant via magicpin, use card on UPI
magicpin cashback rewards (~8% avg)

routeTemplates.tip: magicpin gives cashback as magicpin credits (usable at other merchants) when you pay at partner restaurants. Works via UPI — link your CC to UPI for card rewards too.
routeTemplates.notes: Cashback varies 5-15% across restaurants. Credits valid for 30 days. Works at offline restaurants with UPI QR. Stack with CC on UPI rewards.

routeTemplates.name: Accor ALL → Hotel Booking

steps.label: Book hotel on ALL.com / Accor app with card
Accor ALL loyalty points + member rates (~5%)

routeTemplates.tip: Accor ALL loyalty: ~5% back as points. HDFC Diners Black includes complimentary Accor Plus membership (50% off dining at Accor hotels, 1 free night/year). Always book directly on ALL.com for loyalty points.
routeTemplates.notes: Accor brands: Ibis, Novotel, Pullman, Sofitel, Mercure, Fairmont. Accor Plus (₹15,000/yr) is free with HDFC Diners Black. Points redeemable for stays. Member-only rates typically 5-10% lower.

routeTemplates.name: Marriott Bonvoy → Hotel Booking

steps.label: Book directly on Marriott.com with card
Marriott Bonvoy loyalty points (~5%)

routeTemplates.tip: HDFC Marriott Bonvoy card earns enhanced Bonvoy points on stays. Bonvoy Elite members get free upgrades, late checkout, breakfast. HDFC Regalia Gold milestones give Marriott/Taj vouchers. Book directly for best loyalty earning.
routeTemplates.notes: Marriott Bonvoy points: ~₹0.7-1/point. 30+ brands (JW Marriott, Sheraton, Westin, Le Meridien, W etc). Gold/Platinum Elite unlocks serious perks. Always book via Marriott.com, not OTAs.

routeTemplates.name: Taj/IHCL Direct → Hotel Booking

steps.label: Book on Taj website/app with card
Taj InnerCircle / NeuCoins loyalty (~4%)

routeTemplates.tip: HDFC Regalia Gold milestone vouchers (₹1,500-5,000) are redeemable at Taj properties. Taj InnerCircle members earn NeuCoins on stays. Book directly on tajhotels.com for loyalty benefits.
routeTemplates.notes: Taj InnerCircle Gold+ members get complimentary upgrades and late checkout. Tata Neu integration means NeuCoins earned are usable across Tata ecosystem (BigBasket, Croma, 1mg etc).

routeTemplates.name: ITC Hotels Direct → Hotel Booking

steps.label: Book on ITC Hotels website with card
ITC WelcomRewards loyalty (~3%)

routeTemplates.tip: ITC WelcomRewards program gives loyalty points on direct bookings. Book on itchotels.com for best rate guarantee and loyalty earning.
routeTemplates.notes: ITC hotel brands: ITC Grand, WelcomHotel, Mementos, Storii. Loyalty points redeemable for stays and dining at ITC properties.

routeTemplates.name: MakeMyTrip → Flight Booking

steps.label: Book flight on MakeMyTrip using credit card
MMT rewards + bank offers (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: ICICI MakeMyTrip card gives ~5% on MMT bookings. MMT regularly runs bank-specific instant discount offers (₹500-2,000 off). Check active bank offers on MMT before booking.
routeTemplates.notes: MMT MyRewards loyalty gives additional cashback. ICICI, HDFC, SBI, Axis frequently have active MMT promotions. MMT myBiz for business travel perks.

routeTemplates.name: MakeMyTrip → Hotel Booking

steps.label: Book hotel on MakeMyTrip using credit card
MMT rewards + bank offers (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: MMT hotel bookings stack bank offers with MMT loyalty rewards. Compare with direct hotel loyalty programs (Marriott, Taj, Accor) which give better long-term value.
routeTemplates.notes: OTA booking means no hotel loyalty points. But MMT often has lower prices + bank discounts. Best for one-off bookings at non-chain hotels.

routeTemplates.name: Goibibo → Flight Booking

steps.label: Book flight on Goibibo using credit card
Goibibo goCash+ rewards (~1.5%)

routeTemplates.tip: Goibibo (MakeMyTrip group) offers goCash+ on bookings. Bank offers often same as MMT. Goibibo Plus members get extra perks.
routeTemplates.notes: goCash+ earned on bookings is usable for future Goibibo/MMT bookings. Compare prices across MMT, Goibibo, and ixigo.

routeTemplates.name: Goibibo → Hotel Booking

steps.label: Book hotel on Goibibo using credit card
Goibibo goCash+ rewards (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: Goibibo often has competitive hotel rates. goCash+ earned is typically higher on hotels than flights.
routeTemplates.notes: Compare rates across MMT, Goibibo, direct hotel websites, and SmartBuy (for HDFC users) for best deal.

routeTemplates.name: ixigo → Flight Booking

steps.label: Book flight on ixigo using credit card
ixigo money rewards (~1%)

routeTemplates.tip: ixigo offers fare alerts and price predictions. ixigo money rewards on every booking. Occasionally has exclusive bank offers.
routeTemplates.notes: ixigo money can be used for future bookings. Good for price comparison across airlines.

routeTemplates.name: Uber → Cab Ride

steps.label: Pay for Uber ride using linked credit card
Uber Pro rewards (~1%)

routeTemplates.tip: Link your best travel-rate card to Uber. Axis ACE gives 5% on Uber payments via PhonePe. ICICI Coral gives complimentary Uber rides with milestone spend. Uber Pro loyalty tiers give additional ride discounts.
routeTemplates.notes: Uber codes as travel for most cards. Check if your card gives enhanced rewards on ride-hailing. RuPay CC on UPI also works on Uber.

routeTemplates.name: Ola → Cab Ride

steps.label: Pay for Ola ride using linked credit card
Ola offers (~1%)

routeTemplates.tip: Link your card to Ola for credit card rewards on rides. SBI cards sometimes have Ola-specific offers. Ola Money postpaid can give additional cashback.
routeTemplates.notes: Check Ola app for active bank-specific promotions before riding.

routeTemplates.name: RedBus → Bus Ticket

steps.label: Book bus on RedBus using credit card
RedBus rewards + bank offers (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: RedBus frequently runs bank-specific offers (₹100-250 off). SBI, ICICI, HDFC cards often have active RedBus promotions.
routeTemplates.notes: Check current bank offers on RedBus before booking. redBus Trip Guarantee adds protection.

routeTemplates.name: Paytm → Bill Payment

steps.label: Pay bill on Paytm using credit card / CC on UPI
Paytm cashback offers (~0.5%)

routeTemplates.tip: Paytm runs frequent cashback promotions on bill payments. RuPay CC on UPI works on Paytm. Check active bank offers and Paytm coupons.
routeTemplates.notes: Cashback varies by offer period. Paytm supports CC on UPI for RuPay and select Visa/MC banks. Compare with PhonePe and Google Pay.

routeTemplates.name: CRED → Bill Payment

steps.label: Pay bill on CRED using credit card
CRED cashback / coins (~0.5%)

routeTemplates.tip: CRED gives CRED coins on bill payments (redeemable for cashback/vouchers). CRED occasionally runs flash sales with higher cashback. Premium members get better offers.
routeTemplates.notes: CRED coins value varies. Best used during CRED flash sales for 2-5x value. Also useful for discovering new card offers.

routeTemplates.name: MyJio App → Jio Recharge

steps.label: Recharge Jio via MyJio app using credit card
MyJio cashback/data bonus offers (~1%)

routeTemplates.tip: MyJio app frequently offers cashback and bonus data on prepaid recharges. Amex SmartEarn gives 10x on Jio. Check MyJio for active bank offers before recharging.
routeTemplates.notes: JioFiber/JioAirFiber broadband also payable via MyJio. Jio bundles OTT subs (JioCinema, Netflix) with annual plans — often better value than separate subscriptions.

routeTemplates.name: Vi App → Vodafone Idea Recharge

steps.label: Recharge Vi number via Vi app using credit card
Vi app recharge cashback offers (~0.5%)

routeTemplates.tip: Vi app runs cashback/coupon offers on prepaid recharges. Check Vi app offers section and active bank discount coupons.
routeTemplates.notes: Vi postpaid bills also payable via the app. Limited bank offer partnerships compared to Airtel/Jio.

routeTemplates.name: Freecharge → Bill Payment

steps.label: Pay bill on Freecharge using credit card
Freecharge cashback deals (~1%)

routeTemplates.tip: Freecharge is owned by Axis Bank — Axis cards frequently get exclusive 5-10% cashback on Freecharge. Non-Axis cards also get standard cashback offers.
routeTemplates.notes: Check Freecharge coupons section before paying. Axis ACE 5% stacks with Freecharge cashback. Supports direct credit card payments.

routeTemplates.name: Mobikwik → Bill Payment

steps.label: Pay bill on Mobikwik using credit card
Mobikwik SuperCash rewards (~1%)

routeTemplates.tip: Mobikwik gives SuperCash rewards on bill payments (redeemable up to 10% of next txn). Mobikwik ZIP (BNPL) also earns SuperCash on purchases.
routeTemplates.notes: SuperCash has per-txn usage limits. Check active offers in Mobikwik app. Supports CC on UPI for RuPay cards.

routeTemplates.name: Amazon Pay → Direct Bill Payment

steps.label: Pay bill directly via Amazon Pay using credit card
Amazon Pay cashback offers (~1%)

routeTemplates.tip: ICICI Amazon Pay card gives 2% on bill payments (vs 1% elsewhere). Amazon frequently runs bill payment cashback offers (₹10-50). Check Amazon Pay > Offers tab.
routeTemplates.notes: Different from Amazon GC route — this is direct bill payment on Amazon. ICICI Amazon Pay 2% applies here. Compare with GC route (online rate) for best value.

routeTemplates.name: FASTag Recharge via Payment Apps

steps.label: Recharge FASTag via Paytm/PhonePe/GPay/bank app using CC
App-specific FASTag cashback offers (~0.5%)

routeTemplates.tip: Paytm, PhonePe, Google Pay all support FASTag recharge via credit card. Paytm often runs FASTag-specific cashback. Axis ACE 5% applies on FASTag recharge via PhonePe/GPay.
routeTemplates.notes: FASTag codes as utility payment. RuPay CC on UPI works for FASTag recharge. Bank FASTag apps (HDFC/ICICI/SBI) may also give loyalty points.

routeTemplates.name: PolicyBazaar → Insurance Premium

steps.label: Buy/renew insurance on PolicyBazaar using credit card
PolicyBazaar gift card/cashback offers (~1%)

routeTemplates.tip: PolicyBazaar offers Amazon/Flipkart gift cards on insurance purchases. Compare quotes across insurers. Scapia Federal gives rare 2% on insurance. HDFC SmartBuy Amazon GC route may beat direct payment.
routeTemplates.notes: Health, motor, term life, travel insurance available. Cashback typically as gift vouchers. Compare with HDFC SmartBuy → Amazon GC → pay insurance on Amazon route.

routeTemplates.name: Acko → Insurance (Direct-to-Consumer)

steps.label: Buy Acko insurance directly using credit card
Acko savings — no agent commission (~3%)

routeTemplates.tip: Acko is direct-to-consumer — typically 10-15% cheaper premiums than traditional insurers (no agent commission). Pay with credit card for additional rewards.
routeTemplates.notes: Acko offers car, bike, health, and travel insurance. Lower premiums by cutting agent middleman. Compare with PolicyBazaar quotes.

routeTemplates.name: Go Digit → Insurance Premium

steps.label: Buy Digit insurance using credit card
Digit competitive pricing (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: Go Digit offers competitively priced motor and health insurance with fast claims. Direct online purchase avoids agent fees.
routeTemplates.notes: Digit Insurance: known for simple claims process. Motor, health, travel, and property insurance. Compare with Acko and PolicyBazaar for best rate.

routeTemplates.name: BookMyShow → Movie Tickets (Direct)

steps.label: Book movie tickets on BookMyShow using credit card
BookMyShow bank BOGO/discount offers (~10%)

routeTemplates.tip: BOGO: HDFC Diners Privilege (2 free/mo), ICICI Coral (BOGO on ₹25K spend/qtr), SBI ELITE (2 free/mo). Amex SmartEarn & SBI SimplyClick give 10x on BMS. Check BMS Offers tab for active bank deals.
routeTemplates.notes: Bank BOGO = ~50% off on 2 tickets. 10% shown as conservative average across all users. Also check Bajaj RBL World Prime (BOGO 2x/mo on BMS). BMS convenience fee earns card rewards.

routeTemplates.name: PVR INOX → Movie Tickets

steps.label: Book movie at PVR INOX website/app using credit card
PVR INOX bank offers + F&B deals (~8%)

routeTemplates.tip: Kotak PVR: 2 free tickets/mo + 15% F&B cashback. Axis Flipkart gives 4% at PVR. SBI cards often have PVR BOGO. Check PVR Privilege/Passport for loyalty points.
routeTemplates.notes: PVR INOX Passport loyalty program gives free tickets on points. Multiple bank BOGO tie-ups. Buy F&B combos for best value. Kotak PVR is the king of movie cards.

routeTemplates.name: Swiggy One → Swiggy Food Delivery

steps.label: Order on Swiggy with Swiggy One membership using card
Swiggy One free delivery + extra discounts (~5%)

routeTemplates.tip: Swiggy One saves ₹30-60/order on delivery + extra restaurant discounts. HDFC Diners Black includes complimentary Swiggy One. HDFC Swiggy card gives 10% on all Swiggy orders (cap ₹1,500/mo).
routeTemplates.notes: Swiggy One: ₹149/3mo or ₹399/year. Free delivery on orders above ₹149. Extra discounts on restaurants and Instamart. Well worth it for 3+ orders/month.

routeTemplates.name: Zomato Gold → Zomato Food Delivery

steps.label: Order on Zomato with Zomato Gold membership using card
Zomato Gold free delivery + discounts (~5%)

routeTemplates.tip: Zomato Gold: free delivery, extra discounts, priority support. HDFC Diners Privilege gives 6.67% on Zomato orders. Stack membership savings with card dining rewards.
routeTemplates.notes: Zomato Gold: ₹149/3mo or ₹399/year. Free delivery on orders above ₹149. 5-20% extra off at select restaurants. Similar value to Swiggy One.

routeTemplates.name: Zomato Pay → Restaurant Dining

steps.label: Pay at restaurant via Zomato Pay (scan QR in Zomato app)
Zomato Pay cashback credits (~10%)

routeTemplates.tip: Zomato Pay gives Zomato credits (~10%) when paying at partner restaurants via QR scan. Credits usable on next Zomato order. Stack with card dining rewards.
routeTemplates.notes: Zomato Pay at partner restaurants only. Scan QR at restaurant to pay via Zomato app. Credits expire in 7 days. Zomato Gold members may get higher cashback.

routeTemplates.name: Zepto → Quick Commerce Grocery

steps.label: Order groceries on Zepto using credit card
Zepto bank offers + Zepto Pass savings (~3%)

routeTemplates.tip: Zepto frequently runs bank card offers (₹50-100 off). HDFC, ICICI, Axis cards often have active Zepto promotions. Zepto Pass: free delivery + extra discounts.
routeTemplates.notes: 10-minute delivery. Bank offers are seasonal but frequent. Zepto Pass (from ₹29/mo) gives free delivery and extra discounts. Kotak Cashback+ gives 5% on food delivery.

routeTemplates.name: Blinkit → Quick Commerce Grocery

steps.label: Order on Blinkit using credit card
Blinkit bank offers + Zomato Gold benefits (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: Blinkit (Zomato-owned) gives additional discounts to Zomato Gold members. HDFC, SBI, ICICI often have active Blinkit bank offers. Check Blinkit payment page for deals.
routeTemplates.notes: 10-minute delivery in major cities. Zomato Gold membership gives extra Blinkit perks. Bank card offers available seasonally. Card grocery rate applies.

routeTemplates.name: JioMart → Online Grocery

steps.label: Order groceries on JioMart using credit card
JioMart prices + JioCoins rewards (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: JioMart offers competitive grocery prices. JioCoins earned on purchases are redeemable across Jio ecosystem. Amex SmartEarn gives 10x on Jio merchants.
routeTemplates.notes: JioMart available via app and WhatsApp ordering. JioCoins add to savings. Bank offers available seasonally. Good alternative to BigBasket/Blinkit.

routeTemplates.name: DMart Ready → Grocery

steps.label: Order on DMart Ready (online), pay with credit card
DMart everyday low pricing (~5% cheaper vs others)

routeTemplates.tip: DMart Ready offers lowest grocery prices (wholesale-style pricing). Order online for pickup at DMart store or slot delivery. Credit card accepted on app.
routeTemplates.notes: DMart prices typically 5-15% lower than Blinkit/Zepto/BigBasket. Pickup model saves delivery charges. Limited delivery areas. Best for bulk monthly grocery shopping.

routeTemplates.name: Tata CLiQ → Online Shopping

steps.label: Shop on Tata CLiQ using credit card
Tata CLiQ NeuCoins + bank offers (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: HDFC Millennia gives 5% on Tata CLiQ. HDFC Tata Neu Infinity: 5% NeuCoins. Tata CLiQ Luxury for premium brands. NeuCoins usable across Tata ecosystem.
routeTemplates.notes: Tata CLiQ is authorized brand store (guaranteed genuine products). NeuCoins redeemable at BigBasket, Croma, 1mg, Westside, Taj. Compare with Amazon/Flipkart for pricing.

routeTemplates.name: AJIO → Fashion Shopping

steps.label: Shop on AJIO using credit card
AJIO SuperCoin loyalty + bank offers (~3%)

routeTemplates.tip: Amex SmartEarn gives 10x on AJIO (~5%). AJIO frequently runs bank card offers (extra 10-15% off). Check AJIO payment page for active bank promotions.
routeTemplates.notes: AJIO is Reliance-owned fashion platform. AJIO Luxe for premium brands. Bank offers stack with sale discounts. SuperCoin loyalty program for repeat buyers.

routeTemplates.name: Reliance Digital → Electronics

steps.label: Buy electronics on Reliance Digital (online/store) using CC
Reliance Digital bank offers + JioCoins (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: HDFC Regalia Gold gives 5x on Reliance Digital. Frequent bank No Cost EMI and instant discount offers. JioCoins earned on purchases. Compare with Croma via Tata Neu.
routeTemplates.notes: Reliance Digital: online + 2,000+ offline stores. JioCoins redeemable across Jio ecosystem. Bank card promotions frequent on electronics (₹1,000-5,000 off).

routeTemplates.name: Nykaa → Beauty & Wellness

steps.label: Shop on Nykaa directly using credit card
Nykaa rewards + bank offers (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: Amex SmartEarn gives 10x on Nykaa (~5%). HDFC Regalia Gold gives 5x on Nykaa. Nykaa Pink Friday sales offer up to 50% off + bank card instant discounts.
routeTemplates.notes: Nykaa Privé loyalty program gives rewards and early access to sales. Bank offers stack with sale prices. Compare with Amazon GC route for online rate arbitrage.

routeTemplates.name: 1mg (Tata Health) → Pharmacy

steps.label: Order medicines on 1mg using credit card
1mg discounts + NeuCoins via Tata Neu (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: HDFC Tata Neu Infinity gives 5% NeuCoins on 1mg (Tata ecosystem). 1mg offers 15-25% off medicines by default. Order via Tata Neu app for extra NeuCoins.
routeTemplates.notes: 1mg is part of Tata ecosystem. Prescription medicines, OTC products, lab tests. Order via Tata Neu app for +1% NeuCoins. Card online rate applies.

routeTemplates.name: Apollo 24|7 → Pharmacy & Health

steps.label: Order on Apollo 24|7 using credit card
Apollo Circle savings + partner offers (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: SBI SimplyClick gives 10x on Apollo 24|7 (~2.5%). Apollo Circle membership gives extra 15-20% off medicines. Doctor teleconsultations also available.
routeTemplates.notes: Apollo 24|7 is SBI SimplyClick 10x partner. Circle membership (₹199/3mo): extra discounts on medicines and tests. Lab home collection available.

routeTemplates.name: Netmeds → Pharmacy

steps.label: Order medicines on Netmeds using credit card
Netmeds discounts + NeuCoins via Reliance (~1.5%)

routeTemplates.tip: Netmeds (Reliance-owned) offers 15-20% off medicines. Check for bank card cashback offers. Alternative to 1mg and Apollo for medicine orders.
routeTemplates.notes: Netmeds is Reliance-owned pharmacy platform. Regular bank card offers. NeuPass/JioCoins loyalty integration. Prescription upload required for Rx medicines.

routeTemplates.name: Yatra → Flight Booking

steps.label: Book on Yatra.com using credit card
Yatra eCash rewards + bank offers (~1.5%)

routeTemplates.tip: SBI SimplyClick gives 10x on Yatra (~2.5%). Yatra eCash loyalty gives rewards on bookings. Frequent bank card offers for instant discounts.
routeTemplates.notes: Yatra is SBI SimplyClick 10x partner — best when using SBI SimplyClick. eCash earned on flights and hotels. Compare with MMT/SmartBuy for best price.

routeTemplates.name: Rapido → Auto/Bike Ride

steps.label: Book Rapido ride, pay via UPI with CC linked
Rapido lower fares + offers (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: Rapido is often 20-30% cheaper than Uber/Ola for short distances (auto & bike). Pay via UPI (link CC to UPI app) for card rewards. RuPay CC on UPI works well.
routeTemplates.notes: Rapido: auto, bike taxi, and cab rides. Typically the cheapest ride option in most cities. CC on UPI supported for payments. Card travel rate applies.

routeTemplates.name: AbhiBus → Bus Ticket

steps.label: Book bus on AbhiBus using credit card
AbhiBus aBucks rewards + bank offers (~1.5%)

routeTemplates.tip: AbhiBus aBucks loyalty rewards on bookings. Bank card offers frequently available. Compare prices with RedBus for best deal.
routeTemplates.notes: AbhiBus popular in South India. aBucks redeemable on future bookings. Bank card promotions available seasonally. Card travel rate applies.

routeTemplates.name: ConfirmTkt → Train Ticket

steps.label: Book train via ConfirmTkt app using credit card
ConfirmTkt prediction + offers (~0.5%)

routeTemplates.tip: ConfirmTkt shows confirmation probability for waitlisted tickets. Can auto-book and auto-cancel tickets. Small convenience fee but saves effort.
routeTemplates.notes: ConfirmTkt: prediction engine for waitlist confirmation. Auto-booking feature. Compare with direct IRCTC for lowest fee. Card travel rate applies.

routeTemplates.name: MyGate Pay → Rent Payment

steps.label: Pay rent/maintenance via MyGate using credit card

routeTemplates.tip: MyGate charges ~1.5% platform fee for CC rent payments. Useful if your apartment society already uses MyGate. Covers rent + society maintenance.
routeTemplates.notes: Net reward = card rate − 1.5% fee. Only worth it if card general rate exceeds 1.5%. Many apartment societies integrated with MyGate for payments.

routeTemplates.name: PayRent / Cheq → Rent Payment

steps.label: Pay rent via PayRent/Cheq using credit card

routeTemplates.tip: PayRent, Cheq, Red Giraffes are alternative rent payment platforms. Fees range 1.5-2%. Compare across platforms for lowest processing fee.
routeTemplates.notes: Net reward = card rate − platform fee (~1.75%). Compare with CRED (2%), NoBroker (1.5%), MyGate (1.5%). Some offer occasional cashback to reduce effective fee.

routeTemplates.name: Bajaj Finserv → EMI Shopping

steps.label: Buy on Bajaj Finserv marketplace / No Cost EMI with card
No Cost EMI savings + Bajaj coins (~3%)

routeTemplates.tip: Bajaj Finserv RBL cards get 5x on partner electronics. No Cost EMI across 1M+ products saves 5-8% in interest. Bajaj marketplace often has exclusive bank instant discounts.
routeTemplates.notes: No Cost EMI saves interest effectively. Bajaj coins loyalty program. Wide electronics and lifestyle range. EMI card + credit card combo for max flexibility.

routeTemplates.name: Digital Gold via Payment Apps

steps.label: Buy digital gold on PhonePe/Paytm/GPay using credit card
Gold price appreciation + offers (~0.5%)

routeTemplates.tip: Buy digital gold (24K, 99.9% purity) via PhonePe, Google Pay, Paytm using credit card. Earns card rewards on purchase. Gold backed by Augmont/MMTC-PAMP.
routeTemplates.notes: Platform-specific: PhonePe Gold, Google Pay Gold, Paytm Gold. Card general rate applies. Occasional gold-specific cashback offers. Gold redeemable or sellable anytime. Spread: ~3% buy-sell difference.

routeTemplates.name: EdTech → Course Payment

steps.label: Pay for online course (Coursera/Udemy/UpGrad) using CC
EdTech bank offers + platform discounts (~2%)

routeTemplates.tip: UpGrad, Simplilearn, Great Learning, Coursera, Udemy frequently run bank card EMI offers and instant discounts. No Cost EMI available on premium courses. Card online rate applies.
routeTemplates.notes: Education payments generally earn full card rewards (unlike rent/fuel which some cards exclude). Bank No Cost EMI tie-ups frequent on edtech platforms.
